author: georgep
msg: TS-125: This patch converts the use of offsetof in List.h into the use of a
template argument to handle specialization of SLL/DLL/Queue wrt the Link field.
With GCC 4.4 at least, this change produces exactly the same efficient code on
This patch also contains more fixes for Sun Studio Compiler suite.
Tested: OpenSolaris(osol0906 w/ GCC4.3.2 & Sun Studio), OSX(10.5),
